Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/Madison
ShortDescription: Southbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Madison, Laramie, Jackson and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Madison, Laramie, Jackson and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Madison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
